snippet: Miami Heat forward Chris Andersen was suspended for one game for shoving Tyler Hansbrough of the Pacers during the Eastern Conference finals.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Miami Heat forward Chris Andersen is suspended for one game for shoving Tyler Hansbrough of Indiana Pacers during Eastern Conference finals.
lead_paragraph: Miami Heat forward Chris Andersen was suspended for one game for shoving Tyler Hansbrough of the Pacers during the Eastern Conference finals.
